mapper.select: SELECT Auto_increment FROM information_schema.`TABLES` WHERE Table_Schema='oztt' AND table_name = 't_powder_box'

select a.id as boxId, b.receiverName as receiveName, a.elecExpressNo from t_powder_box a inner join t_receiver_info b on a.receiverId = b.id where 1=1
and orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
